channel.title: Event: Moon Festival (Oct 9~31)
channel.description:
## Moon Festival Live Now!
![image|512x256](upload://qRpTiCezAkxHomn45HmnJA0LSyZ.jpeg)
* Ends Oct 31 * You can still claim anniversary login rewards during this event.
See previous patch notes: https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/mini-patch-v3-0-2-3rd-anniversary-event-draggables/84133

item.title: Event: Moon Festival (Oct 9~31)
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Moon Festival Live Now!

  • Ends Oct 31
  • You can still claim anniversary login rewards during this event.

See previous patch notes:

Mini Patch v3.0.2: 3rd Anniversary Event + Draggables Official Announcements
[AVATAR_KINGSLAYER_2020-512] Event: 3rd Anniversary To celebrate our 3rd anniversary, @ those that login within the next 2~3 weeks, you will be rewarded with an exclusive, progressive title and avatar similar to the previous anniversary rewards. [image] To those that hang out within our Discord ( https://discord.gg/tol ) shortly after this patch launches, you will receive an exclusive/colored Kingslayer III role that will never be handed out again. We will do a small purge before we hand out …
